entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Tracadie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:40 AM ADT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Tracadie 1:00 PM ADT Thursday 16 March 2023
Temperature: -0.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.8 kPa rising
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -2.1°C
Wind: NNW 22 km/h gust 33 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Freezing drizzle. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Freezing drizzle or flurries changing to flurries this afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 1. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Flurries. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near noon then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 2. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Thursday 16 March 2023
